```{r}

variable_bandwidth = function(data, g, h){
  
  #set up random variables 
  n = length(data)
  
  #get initial estimate ~f
  f_til = density(data, bw = g, kernel = "gaussian")  
  
  #set up kernel 
  kernel = function(x){exp(-(x^2)/2)/(2*pi)^(1/2)}
  
  #f-hat function 
  f_hat = function(x){
    
    arg = (x - data)*(f_til$y[data])^(1/2)/h
    
    1/(n*h)
    
    (f_til$x)^(1/2) * kernel(     )
    
  }
  
  
  estimate = data.frame(X = data, Y = NA)
  estimate$Y = ()
  
}
```
